mapper.insert: insert into AQUESTIONTABLE (qtablecode, qcontent, qtitle, qvisible, qpushdate, membercode) values (Aquestion_seq.NEXTVAL, #{qcontent}, #{qtitle}, #{qvisible}, sysdate, #{membercode})
mapper.select: select QTABLECODE, QCONTENT, QTITLE, QREPLY, QVisible, qpushdate, QANSWERDATE, MEMBERCODE from AQUESTIONTABLE order by qpushdate desc
